name: Darkwater Downpour
description:
DARKWATER DOWNPOUR

Your are the resident Sorcerer of Darkwater Village, with the ability to conjure shapes from thin air.. One evening, the seawater rises until it has claimed the village. It's inhabitants are now seeking shelter at higher ground. Once shunned because of your abilities, you are now the last hope of the surviving Villagers In order for the villagers to reach relative safety, you must use your abilities to bridge the gaps over flooded area's so that they may cross.

HOW TO PLAY
Create block's by clicking on the shape's along the top of the screen. Place block's by clicking and dragging them accross the screen. To score points, get your villager's accross the level in one piece. If any fall into the water or are left behind when the timer expire's, then they will not make it.

Good luck!
